name: Survival Knight
description:
I created this game as part of a Unreal Engine beginners course that I took. I loved creating the magical environment, coding the AI, and building a robust character controller. This project has taught me a lot and gave me a good direction of where I want to go next in my game dev journey. 

This game is a top down survival game where you survive against waves of enemies using your sword and magic skills. There are 5 waves to survive. Good luck!

Controls

  • Movement - W,A,S,D
  • Jump - Space
  • Sword Attack - Left Mouse Button
  • Magic Attack - Right Mouse Button
  • Pause Game - Escape or "M"
